pacman.model

类 Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • pacman.model.Ghost
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Ghost
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class defines a ghost as a running thread.

    The ghost is a rectangle that has a position and keeps moving. The movement of ghost is always towards one direction. If it is not able to move forward, its direction will be randomly changed. The ghost can teleport between portals.

    作者:
    Zhangli Wang
    另请参阅:
    GameModel

    • 字段详细资料

      • ghostId

        public static int ghostId
        a count for ghost ID that will be used to read different ghost images

      • ghostStep

        public static double ghostStep
        speed of ghost

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(double x,
             double y)
        Initialize a ghost with a position.

        The ghost is initialized with a certain size and different images according to ghostId. Once a ghost is initialized, it will start its movement with Ghost.createAnimation method.

        参数:
        x - - index of x
        y - - index of y

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAnimation

        public javafx.animation.AnimationTimer getAnimation()
        Gets the animation of the ghost.
        返回:
        the animation of the ghost

      • createAnimation

        public javafx.animation.AnimationTimer createAnimation(java.lang.String arg0)
        Creates an animation of the ghost.

        The animation keeps the ghost moving. The ghost will keep moving forward. If it meets an obstacle, the direction will be changed to either left or right relative to the front of ghost. The ghost always check whether it touches a portal.

        参数:
        arg0 - the direction of the actor
        返回:
        an animation of the actor

      • checkPortalCoalition

        public void checkPortalCoalition(DoublePortals portals)
        Checks if ghost is touching a portal.
        参数:
        portals - the double portal represented as left portal and right portal

      • run

        public void run()
        start the animation thread
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
